etymology.description: 佛(Buddha) + 教(religion/teachings) + 徒(follower/disciple) = follower of Buddhism.
etymology.interpretation: Refers to a person who follows or identifies with Buddhism and the teachings of the Buddha. Emphasizes affiliation with the Buddhist faith rather than clerical status.

examples.chinese: 他是一名虔诚的佛教徒(他是一名虔誠的佛教徒)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yì míng qiánchéng de Fójiàotú.

examples.chinese: 很多佛教徒在寺庙里诵经(很多佛教徒在寺廟裡誦經)。
examples.pinyin: Hěn duō Fójiàotú zài sìmiào lǐ sòng jīng.
examples.english: Many Buddhists chant scriptures in temples.

examples.chinese: 作为佛教徒(作為佛教徒)，她每天打坐和行善(她每天打坐和行善)。
examples.pinyin: Zuòwéi Fójiàotú, tā měitiān dǎzuò hé xíngshàn.
examples.english: As a Buddhist, she meditates and does good deeds every day.
